languages.text: "Коль отныне быть мне твоей тенью, Домин'{name}, нам должно свершить ритуал, что скрепит эти узы, угодные Неумирающему. Поговори со мной на мостике, и я отведу нас в подходящее для обряда место".
languages.translation_comment: Этот куй переводит игрока в ивент RitualEvent_dialogue

traits.locale_text: "Коль отныне быть мне твоей тенью, Домин'{name}, нам должно свершить ритуал, что скрепит эти узы, угодные Неумирающему. Поговори со мной на мостике, и я отведу нас в подходящее для обряда место".

languages.translation_comment: Этот куй переводит игрока в ивент RitualEvent_dialogue

languages.text: "As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."
languages.original_text: "Коль отныне быть мне твоей тенью, Домин'{name}, нам должно свершить ритуал, что скрепит эти узы, угодные Неумирающему. Поговори со мной на мостике, и я отведу нас в подходящее для обряда место".

traits.locale_text: "As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."

"As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."

"As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."

"As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. I shall await you on the deck where your officers carry out their service."

"As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."

"As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. I will await you on the deck where your officers carry out their service."

"As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."

"As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."

languages.text: «Puesto que ahora estoy destinada a ser su sombra, Domin'{name}, debemos realizar un ritual para sellar nuestro vínculo, pues eso complace al Inmortal. Hablemos en el puente e iremos a un lugar adecuado para el ritual».
languages.original_text: "As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."

traits.locale_text: «Puesto que ahora estoy destinada a ser su sombra, Domin'{name}, debemos realizar un ritual para sellar nuestro vínculo, pues eso complace al Inmortal. Hablemos en el puente e iremos a un lugar adecuado para el ritual».

languages.text: 「ドミン{name}、我は陛下の影となる運命です。我らの絆を結ぶ固める儀式を執り行いましょう。不死の者がお望みですから。ブリッジでお話ししてから、儀式にふさわしい場所へとお連れいたしましょう」
languages.original_text: "As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."

traits.locale_text: 「ドミン{name}、我は陛下の影となる運命です。我らの絆を結ぶ固める儀式を執り行いましょう。不死の者がお望みですから。ブリッジでお話ししてから、儀式にふさわしい場所へとお連れいたしましょう」

languages.text: “既然我已经是你的影子了，秘者{name}，那我们必须举行一场仪式，巩固我们的关系，取悦不死之神。来舰桥上和我谈谈吧，之后我会带你去适合举行仪式的地方。”
languages.original_text: "As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."

traits.locale_text: “既然我已经是你的影子了，秘者{name}，那我们必须举行一场仪式，巩固我们的关系，取悦不死之神。来舰桥上和我谈谈吧，之后我会带你去适合举行仪式的地方。”

languages.text: "Da ich nun dazu bestimmt bin, Euer Schatten zu sein, Domin'{name}, müssen wir ein Ritual ausführen, das unsere Bindung besiegelt, denn das erfreut den Todlosen. Sprechen wir auf der Brücke, dann bringe ich uns an einen geeigneten Ort für das Ritual."
languages.original_text: "As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."

traits.locale_text: "Da ich nun dazu bestimmt bin, Euer Schatten zu sein, Domin'{name}, müssen wir ein Ritual ausführen, das unsere Bindung besiegelt, denn das erfreut den Todlosen. Sprechen wir auf der Brücke, dann bringe ich uns an einen geeigneten Ort für das Ritual."

languages.text: « Puisque je suis désormais appelée à devenir votre ombre, Domin'{name}, l'Immortel veut que nous accomplissions un rituel propre à sceller notre lien. Retrouvons-nous sur la passerelle, et je vous conduirai en un lieu propre à accueillir une telle cérémonie. »
languages.original_text: "As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."

traits.locale_text: « Puisque je suis désormais appelée à devenir votre ombre, Domin'{name}, l'Immortel veut que nous accomplissions un rituel propre à sceller notre lien. Retrouvons-nous sur la passerelle, et je vous conduirai en un lieu propre à accueillir une telle cérémonie. »

languages.text: "Domin'{name}, artık kaderimde senin gölgen olmak yazıldığına göre bağımızı mühürleyecek bir ayin gerçekleştirmeliyiz. Çünkü bu şekilde Ölmeyen'i memnun edebiliriz. Köprüde konuşalım, sonrasında bizi ayine münasip bir yere götüreceğim."
languages.original_text: "As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."

traits.locale_text: "Domin'{name}, artık kaderimde senin gölgen olmak yazıldığına göre bağımızı mühürleyecek bir ayin gerçekleştirmeliyiz. Çünkü bu şekilde Ölmeyen'i memnun edebiliriz. Köprüde konuşalım, sonrasında bizi ayine münasip bir yere götüreceğim."
